params.name: vision_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize InstructBlipVideoVisionConfig.

params.name: qformer_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize InstructBlipVideoQFormerConfig.

params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize any PretrainedConfig.

params.name: num_query_tokens
params.description: The number of query tokens passed through the Transformer.

params.name: video_token_index
params.description: Token index of special video token.
